source: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_SEQ_00<tab>Guildmaster Cocobuki wishes you to learn from the next chapter of <var 1A 02 /var>Thaumaturgy: The Yawning Abyss<var 1A 01 /var>.
target: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_SEQ_00<tab>呪術士ギルドマスターのココブキは冒険者に次なる呪術の深淵の章を教えようとしている。

source: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_SEQ_01<tab>Listen to Cocoboha, the second-youngest brother, as he instructs you from the chapter entitled “The Threat of Perplexity.”
target: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_SEQ_01<tab>呪術士ギルドマスター、ココボハから呪術の深淵の「取り囲まれる危機」を学ぼう。

source: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_SEQ_02<tab>You learn of a recent spate of murders perpetrated by a villain known only as the “Mageslayer.” The killer appears to be exclusively targeting thaumaturges, draining them of their aetheric vitality. Head to Nophica's Wells in western Thanalan, and aid Cocobusi in his attempt to track down this seemingly insatiable predator.
target: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_SEQ_02<tab>呪術士の魔力を奪い、殺してしまう「魔力強盗」が現れているらしい。魔力強盗を仕留めるため「ノフィカの井戸」にいる「ココブシ」に話しかけよう。

source: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_SEQ_03<tab>Cocobusi has bid you examine the remains of the slain thaumaturges. Head into the nearby stream, and see what evidence of the killer can be found.
target: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_SEQ_03<tab>「呪術士の亡骸」を調べ、「魔力強盗」の手がかりを見つけよう。

source: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_SEQ_04<tab>You have recovered a bloody scepter, a shredded tome, and a bloody bracelet from the corpses of the unfortunate mages. Return to Cocobusi, and see what he can determine from the sullied objects.
target: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_SEQ_04<tab>調べた亡骸から見つけた「血濡れのセプター」「引き裂かれた古書」「血濡れの腕輪」をココブシに渡そう。

source: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_SEQ_05<tab>After noting the freshness of the blood staining the items you recovered, Cocobusi believes the killer may yet be lurking nearby. Head back into the stream, and draw out the Mageslayer by using yourself as bait. You nervously hope that the Roegadyn warrior does, indeed, stand ready to leap into the fray!
target: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_SEQ_05<tab>ココブシの推理によれば、犯人はまだ近くにいる可能性があるらしい。「指定地点」で「魔力強盗」が現れるまで待機しよう。

source: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_SEQ_06<tab>With the help of the stalwart swordsman, you have succeeded in defeating the trio of imps. Report your success to Cocobusi.
target: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_SEQ_06<tab>屈強な剣術士と協力して、インプを全て討伐した。ココブシに報告しに行こう。

source: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_SEQ_07<tab>Cocobusi laments that a single imp managed to escape the scene of slaughter. Search for the cowardly voidsent in the shaded outcropping to the southeast, and bring your trial to a satisfying conclusion.
target: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_SEQ_07<tab>ココブシによると、一匹インプが逃げてしまったようだ。南西の方へと逃げた「インプ」を討伐すべく、洞窟内にある怪しい岩陰を調べよう。

source: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_SEQ_08<tab>The true identity of the Mageslayer has been revealed. Return to the Thaumaturges' Guild and report to Cocoboha.
target: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_SEQ_08<tab>試練の終了を「呪術士ギルド」の「ココボハ」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_SEQ_09<tab>Cocoboha, seemingly unaware of his younger sibling's possession, declares that with the successful completion of this lesson's trial, your training with the <var 1A 02 /var>Yawning Abyss<var 1A 01 /var> is now at an end. Speak with Cocobuki, and learn what is to be done about Cocobusi.
target: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_SEQ_09<tab>ココボハによると、今回の試練で「呪術の深淵」は修了らしい。しかし、ココブキの様子がおかしいようだ。「ココブキ」に話をきこう。

source:
TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_SEQ_10<tab>Cocobuki appears shaken and dismayed by his confrontation with the voidsent-possessed Cocobusi. He asks that you leave him in peace for a time, that he might consider his next course of action.

※The next thaumaturge quest will be available from Cocobygo upon reaching level 25.
target:
TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_SEQ_10<tab>ココブキは、ココブシが妖異に憑依されたことに動揺していた。彼はしばらく考える時間が欲しいようだ。

※呪術士のレベルが25以上になると、ココビゴから
　次の呪術士クエストを受注することができます。

source: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Cocoboha.
target: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_TODO_00<tab>ココボハと話す

source: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Cocobusi in Nophica's Wells.
target: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_TODO_01<tab>ノフィカの井戸のココブシと話す

source: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_TODO_02<tab>Gather evidence from the thaumaturges' corpses.
target: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_TODO_02<tab>呪術士の亡骸を調べて証拠を入手

source: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_TODO_03<tab>Deliver the evidence to Cocobusi.
target: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_TODO_03<tab>ココブシに呪術士の遺品を渡す

source: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_TODO_04<tab>Offer yourself as bait.
target: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_TODO_04<tab>指定地点で待機する

source: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_TODO_05<tab>Speak with Cocobusi.
target: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_TODO_05<tab>ココブシと話す

source: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_TODO_06<tab>Investigate the shaded outcropping.
target: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_TODO_06<tab>怪しい岩陰を調べる

source: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_TODO_07<tab>Report to Cocoboha at the Thaumaturges' Guild.
target: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_TODO_07<tab>呪術士ギルドのココボハに報告

source: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_TODO_08<tab>Speak with Cocobuki.
target: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_TODO_08<tab>ココブキと話す

source:
TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_SCENE00019_INSTANCE_BATTLE_YESNO_TITLE<tab>Duty calls. Do you wish to proceed with
“The Threat of Perplexity”?
target: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_SCENE00019_INSTANCE_BATTLE_YESNO_TITLE<tab>クエスト「呪術クエスト200」のバトルを開始しますか？

source: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_SCENE00019_INSTANCE_BATTLE_YESNO_YES<tab>Yes
target: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_SCENE00019_INSTANCE_BATTLE_YESNO_YES<tab>はい

source: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_SCENE00019_INSTANCE_BATTLE_YESNO_NO<tab>No
target: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_SCENE00019_INSTANCE_BATTLE_YESNO_NO<tab>いいえ

source: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_COCOBUKI_000_001<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, you're safe! I feared you had fallen victim to the “Mageslayer”! Have you not heard of the recent spate of gruesome killings taking place within Ul'dah?
target:
TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_COCOBUKI_000_001<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>！　無事でしたか！
最近「魔力強盗」による、
奇妙な変死事件が多発していて心配しましたよ。

source: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_COCOBUKI_000_003<tab>Each case involves at least one dead thaumaturge, and every corpse is found bloody, battered, and utterly drained of aetheric energy.
target:
TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_COCOBUKI_000_003<tab>犠牲者は全て呪術士、死因は「魔力の枯渇」とのこと。
どうやら魔力……すなわち命の源たるエーテルを
全て奪われてしまったようです。

source: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_COCOBUKI_000_005<tab>Ill tidings aside, I am glad to see you alive and glowing with vitality─it is time for you to delve into the final chapter of the <var 1A 02 /var>Yawning Abyss<var 1A 01 /var>. Cocoboha, our second-youngest sibling, will read to you from “The Threat of Perplexity.”
target:
TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_COCOBUKI_000_005<tab>とにかく無事でなによりでした。
今日は五男のココボハから、「呪術の深淵」最終章……
「取り囲まれる危機」の章を学んできなさい。

source: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_COCOBOHA_000_010<tab>Bwahaha! Greetings, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Are you once more prepared to peruse the pages of power and peril? Then let us begin.
target:
TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_COCOBOHA_000_010<tab>アハハ！　<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>。
ようやく僕の番が来たみたいだね。
さっさと「取り囲まれる危機」の章を読み進めようか！

source:
TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_COCOBOHA_000_011<tab>“The Threat of Perplexity.
Ah, how magnificent the daunting power we wield. Flames pursue, ice transfixes, and lightning dances into the ranks of our enemies.
target:
TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_COCOBOHA_000_011<tab>「呪術の深淵：取り囲まれる危機」
嗚呼、我が華々しき魔力よ、素晴らしきかな。
豪炎広がり、氷刃連なり、雷撃舞い散り敵を滅さん。

source: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_COCOBOHA_000_012<tab>“But what terror descends when, from all sides, those ranks close? Flames are smothered, ice crushed, and lightning grounded. Know you this threat, and ware you the multitudinous foe.”
target:
TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_COCOBOHA_000_012<tab>嗚呼、取り囲まれし時の、恐ろしきかな。
その豪炎燃え盛らず、その氷刃連なることなく、
その雷撃舞い散ることなし。我、危機を覚えるなり。

source: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_COCOBOHA_000_013<tab>Is the point of this passage readily apparent? It would be most problematic, for example, should you meet this malefic Mageslayer and he─or she─proves to be multiple murderers.
target:
TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_COCOBOHA_000_013<tab>──要はさぁ、大量の敵に囲まれたら超ピンチってこと！
例えばさ、今話題の「魔力強盗」が、
複数犯だったりしたら、呪術士なんてひとたまりもないね！

source: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_COCOBOHA_000_017<tab>What a thaumaturge needs is a thickset thrall...er, courageous companion to accompany <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> in cases where collective cronies are expected. Now, as for your trial─
target:
TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_COCOBOHA_000_017<tab>だから今回は～、囮……じゃなくて、
お仲間を一人連れて試練を進めてほしいんだけど……。

source: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_COCOBUSI_000_018<tab>Cocoboha! Pray allow me to suggest a PRACTICAL course for <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>'s training!
target:
TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_COCOBUSI_000_018<tab>ココボハ兄さん、その試練僕に手伝わせてください！
僕、前も<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>の試練を手伝ったし！

source: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_COCOBUSI_000_019<tab>The town is buzzing with the news of yet more SLAUGHTERED thaumaturges, their mutilated bodies found fouling the waters of Nophica's Wells. I would have <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> aid me in hunting down the culprit while the trail is yet FRESH!
target:
TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_COCOBUSI_000_019<tab>「ノフィカの井戸」で、例の魔力強盗の被害者と思われる
呪術士の亡骸が複数見つかったんですよぉ！
早く犯人を倒すためにも、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>の力を借りたくて！

source: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_COCOBOHA_000_020<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> may have tolerated your interruption of <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> trial the last time, Busi, but you are hardly the hardy henchman <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> needs to clear such a hazardous hurdle.
target:
TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_COCOBOHA_000_020<tab>アハハ！　ココブシじゃん。
前回<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>の試練に手出しをしたらしいけど、
今回はちょっと、ココブシじゃダメだよ～。

source: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_COCOBUSI_000_021<tab>Your concerns are understandable, brother. If it would allay your FEARS, I can introduce <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> to a valiant warrior who recently entered my employ.
target:
TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_COCOBUSI_000_021<tab>大丈夫、僕、腕利きの剣術士と仲良くなったんですよ。
彼を<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>に紹介すればいいんでしょ？

source: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_COCOBOHA_000_022<tab>You have secured the services of a stalwart swordsman? Then, that would, indeed, be in line with learning the lesson of the day. Perhaps─
target:
TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_COCOBOHA_000_022<tab>アハハ！　なにそれ、面白いじゃん。
そいつと<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>を組ませるんなら、
「取り囲まれる危機」の章の試練内容にピッタリだ。

source: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_COCOBUSI_000_023<tab>Come now, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Let us be about our business before Cocoboha has a change of HEART. I'll be waiting for you in Nophica's Wells!
target:
TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_COCOBUSI_000_023<tab>さあさあさあ、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、
兄の気が変わらないうちに、さっさと行きましょう。
ノフィカの井戸で待ってますねぇ♪

source: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_COCOBUKI_000_024<tab>Was that...Cocobusi?
target: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_COCOBUKI_000_024<tab>ココブシ…………？

source: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_COCOBUSI_000_030<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, so GOOD of you to come! My Roegadyn friend here is the warrior I mentioned back at the Ossuary.
target:
TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_COCOBUSI_000_030<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、さっすがよく来てくれました！
隣のでかいルガディン族は、僕の友達の剣術士です！

source: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_COCOBUSI_000_032<tab>Now, there's no time to waste! Why don't you head into the stream and examine the bodies of the slain mages? I would go with you, but with my DELICATE stomach, I fear I might...contaminate the scene. Remember: you're looking for anything that might help us track down this killer.
target:
TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_COCOBUSI_000_032<tab>ノフィカの井戸の水辺に、無残な呪術士の亡骸があります。
なんだか汚いし、僕は触りたくないんで！
犯人の手がかりを調査してくださいね♪

source: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_COCOBUSI_000_210<tab>You'll find the bloodied CORPSES over in the running stream east of here. Examine the remains, and see what clues you can find!
target:
TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_COCOBUSI_000_210<tab>ノフィカの井戸の水辺に、無残な呪術士の亡骸があります。
亡骸を調べて、手がかりになるものを見つけてください！

source: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_GLADIATOR_000_200<tab>The Lalafell promised me a sack full o' gil to do what I do best─an' that's keepin' all the attention on me. Hah!
target:
TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_GLADIATOR_000_200<tab>報酬を積まれてな、そこのちっこいのに頼まれたんだ。
盾なら俺に任せろ！　よろしくな、相棒！

source: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_COCOBUSI_000_040<tab>Did you uncover anything...incriminating?
target: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_COCOBUSI_000_040<tab>なにか手がかりはありましたかぁー？

source: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_COCOBUSI_000_041<tab>Hee hee! The blood is yet slick to the touch. The SLAUGHTER must have been recent indeed.
target:
TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_COCOBUSI_000_041<tab>ウフフ……どの血もまだ乾ききっていない。
まだ襲われて間もないってことですよねー♪

source: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_COCOBUSI_000_042<tab>The villain may yet lurk nearby! Return to the creek where the bodies lay and linger for a time. I daresay your aura, saturated as it is with ENTICING aetheric energy, will lure the Mageslayer into the open. Have courage, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─our burly companion stands ready to leap to your aid!
target:
TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_COCOBUSI_000_042<tab>きっと犯人は近くにいます！
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、さっきの死体の近くで待ってみてください。
あなたの魔力に誘われて、「魔力強盗」が現れるはずだ！

source: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_COCOBUSI_000_215<tab>Back to the stream, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Wait by the place where you found the bodies. Your ALLURING aura may serve to draw out this insatiable Mageslayer.
target:
TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_COCOBUSI_000_215<tab>先ほどの死体の近くで待ってみてください。
あなたの魔力に誘われて、「魔力強盗」が現れるはずだ！

source: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_COCOBUSI_000_050<tab>It seems your partnership with our hired blade went splendidly! It is unfortunate, though, that one of the imps was able to FLUTTER away... Oh? Did you not notice?
target:
TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_COCOBUSI_000_050<tab>さすが、剣術士さんと息ぴったりでしたねぇ！
ただ、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん気づかなかったと思いますけど、
インプが一匹だけ逃げてたみたいなんです……。

source: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_COCOBUSI_000_052<tab>You wouldn't wish to report to Cocoboha with your trial but half-finished, would you? Of course not. I'm AFRAID, however, that the Roegadyn has already collected his recompense and departed for the nearest alehouse. What to do, what to do?
target:
TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_COCOBUSI_000_052<tab>これじゃぁ試練を完遂したって、
ココボハ兄さんに報告できないですよね……。
でも、剣術士さんはさっさと帰っちゃったし……。

source: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_COCOBUSI_000_054<tab>Hmmm. Surely, a thaumaturge of your CALIBER can handle a single imp, yes? If I'm not mistaken, it fled into that little cave over there. Hurry now, before it slips away into some hidden nook or cranny!
target:
TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_COCOBUSI_000_054<tab>でも<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さんなら、ひとりで大丈夫ですよね？
逃げたインプは、洞窟の「怪しい岩陰」に隠れたようです！
あの辺りを調べてみればいいんじゃないですか？

source: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_COCOBUSI_000_060<tab>The imp must be hiding inside that little cave. If you HURRY, you may catch it before it escapes you entirely!
target:
TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_COCOBUSI_000_060<tab>逃げたインプは、洞窟の中……
「怪しい岩陰」に隠れたようです！
あの辺りを調べてみてくださいよぉ♪

source: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_COCOBUKI_000_100<tab>That is <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> Cocobusi. Well, it <var 1A 02 /var>is<var 1A 01 /var> Cocobusi...but a Cocobusi possessed by the voidsent that escaped from Mormo's urn! It was feeding on the aetheric energy of all those slain thaumaturges.
target:
TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_COCOBUKI_000_100<tab>「それ」は、ココブシではありません……。
呪術士から魔力を奪い、殺害したのも、
モルモーの壺から脱し、ココブシに憑依した「妖異」です。

source: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_SUCCUBUS_000_102<tab>Hee hee hee! And you, my dear, mana-rich <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, were to be NEXT! I have wanted to absorb YOUR delicious power since the moment we met.
target:
TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_SUCCUBUS_000_102<tab>………ウフフフフフ。
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>の魔力は、美味そうでねぇ。
初めて見た時からずっと、狙っていたのよぉ。

source: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_SUCCUBUS_000_103<tab>A pity. This has been such an AMUSING charade. How ever did you see through it?
target:
TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_SUCCUBUS_000_103<tab>もうちょっと騙せると思ったのに、残念ねぇ……。
アンタには気づかれちまってたってわけぇ？

source: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_COCOBUKI_000_104<tab>Hm hm hm. I am Cocobusi's brother. How could I not? It is time I destroyed you, Mormo, and put a stop to these sinister killings. As the eldest, I must take responsibility for my family's misadventures.
target:
TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_COCOBUKI_000_104<tab>ククク……私はココブシの兄ですからねぇ、当然ですよ。
……今のうちにお前を殺し、被害の拡大を食い止めます。
身内の問題です、長男として責任は持たないと。

source: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_SUCCUBUS_000_106<tab>Hee hee. A coward like YOU? Destroy ME? Your opening strike should have pierced my heart, but instead, you aimed for the KNIFE.
target:
TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_SUCCUBUS_000_106<tab>ウフフ……アンタみたいな臆病者には無理よぉ。
呪術士なら、一撃目で「私」を直接狙うべきだったのに、
わざわざ「ナイフ」を狙ったんだもんねぇ♪

source: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_SUCCUBUS_000_107<tab>Fear stays your hand─fear that slaying me will ALSO slay your sibling!
target: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_SUCCUBUS_000_107<tab>アンタ、私と一緒に弟を殺すのが怖いんでしょう？

source: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_SUCCUBUS_000_109<tab>Hee hee! Poor, spineless thaumaturge. I shall, however, leave you with a pleasant thought: it was Cocobusi's FERVENT wish to amass this power!
target:
TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_SUCCUBUS_000_109<tab>ウフフ、臆病者のお兄さん。
ここは引くけどいいこと教えてあげる♪
魔力を集めているのは、ココブシちゃんの願いでもあるのよぉ？

source: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_SUCCUBUS_000_110<tab>He CRAVED the arcane strength to stand beside his brothers as an equal. What a shame that he must now stand AGAINST you! Hee hee hee!
target:
TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_SUCCUBUS_000_110<tab>彼、お兄さんと一緒に戦いたいんですってぇ！
まぁ敵になっちゃったけど、それは仕方ないわよね。
ウフフフフフ♪

source: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_COCOBUKI_000_111<tab>It pains me to admit, but there is some truth to that creature's words. I surrendered the perfect opportunity to end this. I have betrayed my own teachings...
target:
TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_COCOBUKI_000_111<tab>……決定的な攻撃の機会を逃してしまうとは、
私は呪術士失格ですねぇ……。

source: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_COCOBUKI_000_112<tab>Return to the Ossuary and report the completion of your trial, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I will remain here for a time and...gather my thoughts.
target:
TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_COCOBUKI_000_112<tab>……ココボハに与えられた試練の報告がまだでしょう？
一度、呪術士ギルドに帰りなさい。
私は少し……頭を冷やします。

source: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_COCOBOHA_000_120<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Cocobuki has advised me of your adventures. It seems the Mageslayer slithered away, but your stint with the swordsman was nonetheless successful!
target:
TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_COCOBOHA_000_120<tab>おっかえり～！　<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>！
ココブキ兄ちゃんに聞いたよ。
魔力強盗は逃したけど、剣術士との共闘は完璧だったって！

source: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_COCOBOHA_000_122<tab>Consider this chapter complete; your time with our tome of teachings is at an end!
target:
TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_COCOBOHA_000_122<tab>兄ちゃんが言うなら問題ないからね、
これで「呪術の深淵」は修了！　一人前ってことさ！

source: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_COCOBOHA_000_125<tab>Ahem. Well, to be absolutely accurate, there <var 1A 02 /var>is<var 1A 01 /var> an addendum with additional advice, but Cocobuki considers it “extracurricular.” Even I dare not delve into those diabolical depths─I do not yet deign to die, you understand!
target:
TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_COCOBOHA_000_125<tab>まあ、実は「裏の章」もあるんだけど、
ココブキ兄ちゃんも、別にやらなくていいって言うんだ。
僕だって挑戦してないよ、無駄に死にたくないしね！

source: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_COCOBUKI_000_140<tab>I have yet to inform my brothers of Cocobusi's misfortune; I have yet to reconcile the maelstrom within my own mind.
target:
TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_COCOBUKI_000_140<tab>……まだ、弟達には何も説明していません。
私自身が、どうするべきかまだわからないからです。

source: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_COCOBUKI_000_141<tab>The most fundamental lessons of thaumaturgy demanded I slay the creature where it stood. It was the most opportune moment to strike─minimal risk, and victory all but assured. How many more will suffer for my hesitation...and my cowardice?
target:
TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_COCOBUKI_000_141<tab>私はあの場で、ココブシごと殺すべきだった……。
それが最もリスクの低い勝利だったはずだ。
しかし…………。

source: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_COCOBUKI_000_142<tab>It will likely be some time, however, before Mormo resurfaces to kill again. Now that we have uncovered the deception, the voidsent will seek a new hunting ground where Cocobusi's face is unknown.
target:
TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_COCOBUKI_000_142<tab>……おそらく、件の妖異「モルモー」が
次の行動に出るまでは、時間がかかるでしょう。
一度見つかった以上、別の場所に移動するはずです。

source: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_COCOBUKI_000_143<tab>And though the respite may be brief, I must devote this time to considering my next course of action. Pray leave me to my musings, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target:
TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_COCOBUKI_000_143<tab>……すみませんがその間、
もう少し考えさせてください。

source: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_QIB_TODO_001<tab>Defeat the soulsucker imp and its minions!
target: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_QIB_TODO_001<tab>ソウルサッカーたちを倒せ！

source: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_FRIEND_BATTLETALK_01<tab>Aha! The demon shows its claws!
target: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_FRIEND_BATTLETALK_01<tab>へへっ！犯人のお出ましのようだな……！

source:
TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_FRIEND_BATTLETALK_02<tab>I'll keep it busy.
You just focus on magickin'!
target: TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_FRIEND_BATTLETALK_02<tab>俺が敵をひきつける！お前は攻撃魔法をぶっ放せ！

source:
TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_FRIEND_BATTLETALK_03<tab>This bastard's got some nasty spells!
Stay well back, you hear!?
target:
TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_FRIEND_BATTLETALK_03<tab>チッ、通常のインプより高位の魔法を使いやがる！
近づくとやばいぜ！

source:
TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_FRIEND_BATTLETALK_04<tab>Put the big bugger to sleep!
I can't take three at once!
target:
TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_FRIEND_BATTLETALK_04<tab>くっ！3匹はきついな。
でかいのを眠らせてくれ！ちっこい方から片付けるぞ！

source:
TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_FRIEND_BATTLETALK_05<tab>That takes care o' that!
I'm off to collect me coin!
target:
TEXT_CLSTHM200_00351_FRIEND_BATTLETALK_05<tab>よぉし、任務完了！お疲れさん！
そんじゃ俺は、報酬もらって帰るぜ！
